---
title: "zpy: python3 via zmq in max"
---

A max external which uses `czmq` to connect to a separate python process

The objective is to replicate what the `py` external does but using czmq.

## Requires

```bash
brew install czmq
```

## Status

- [ ] proof-of-concept
